app_name: Groups Control Groups Streaming Apps VH1
app_description: Enjoy Love Hip Hop Miami Black Ink Crew New York Nick Cannon Presents: Wild n Out and many more available right in the palm of your hand with the VH1 app. You ll also get exclusive content including cast reactions bonus clips and deleted scenes. Plus you can now watch Pluto TV via the VH1 app! Watch full episodes from your favorite series the day after they air. Sign in with your TV or cable provider to unlock even more episodes and exclusive content including: Love Hip Hop Miami Black Ink Crew New York Nick Cannon Presents: Wild n Out VH1 Couples Retreat Black Ink Crew Los Angeles Basketball Wives RuPaul s Secret Celebrity Drag Race VH1 Family Reunion: Love Hip Hop Edition Black Ink Crew Chicago VH1 Couples Retreat Love Hip Hop Hollywood Signing in with your TV provider is simple: Just tap on Settings select your provider and log in with your provider username and password. For more details about signing in with your TV provider contact appsupport vh1.com. APP FEATURES: We save your spot so that you never miss a scene. Can t finish an episode Continue watching right where you left off. Just tap on the series you were watching and our video player does the rest. Stream Live TV. That s right you can even watch VH1 in real time when you sign in with your TV provider. Chromecast support lets you cast your favorite shows to your TV. Just hook up your TV and your Chromecast device. Watch Pluto TV via the VH1 app. The VH1 app requires iOS 11.2 or later. Full episode streaming is available within the U.S. only. For help contact appsupport vh1.com. For more information about this app and online behavioral advertising check out http: srp.viacom.com sitefaq.html. The Terms of Use for this app include arbitration for disputes see http: legal.viacom.com FAQs .
